<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачка.html>да́чка</a></b>

Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дач-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dáča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> dacha

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:suburban.html>suburban</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>means</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:transport.html>transport</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a>.<a href = vnd.unilang:e.html>e</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:take.html>taking</a> passengers <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> dachas</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дачный.html>да́чный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:поезд.html>по́езд</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dáčnyj</b> pójezd</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:suburban.html>suburban</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:train.html>train</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дача.html>да́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

***дающий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дающий.html>даю́щий</a> (162)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

***два.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> (75)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dъva</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*dwóh₁</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>Numeral</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dva</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> (2)</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>Usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>notes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><i><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <i><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b></i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:when.html>when</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:even.html>even</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> compounds (22, 32, 42, 102, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>.), <a href = vnd.unilang:govern.html>govern</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a>.<i></i>
</p>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчика</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dva</b> málʹčika</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:boy.html>boys</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:boy.html>boy</a></span>”)</div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dve</b> knígi</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>books</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>book</a></span>”)</div></li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пятьдесят.html>пятьдеся́т</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мальчик.html>ма́льчика</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">pjatʹdesját <b>dva</b> málʹčika</i> ― <span class="e-translation">fifty-two <a href = vnd.unilang:boy.html>boys</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally">fifty-two <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:boy.html>boy</a></span>”)</div></li></ul></dd></dl>
<ul><li><i><a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>In</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:become.html>become</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>In</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:animate.html>animate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:become.html>become</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:inanimate.html>inanimate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:remain.html>remain</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a>.</i></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>Две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ки</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кота́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:журнал.html>журна́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свалиться.html>свали́лись</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стола́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Dve</b> sobáki, <b>dva</b> kotá, <b>dve</b> knígi <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <b>dva</b> žurnála svalílisʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:so.html>so</a> stolá.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>Two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dog.html>dogs</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cat.html>cats</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>books</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:journal.html>journals</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fall.html>fell</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:table.html>table</a>.</span></dd></dl></div> (<i>"<a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a>" transforms <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>nouns</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a>.</i>)</li>
<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>двух</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́к</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>двух</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кото́в</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:журнал.html>журна́ла</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> vížu <b>dvux</b> sobák, <b>dvux</b> kotóv, <b>dve</b> knígi <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <b>dva</b> žurnála.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>see</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dog.html>dogs</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cat.html>cats</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>books</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:journal.html>journals</a>.</span></dd></dl></div> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>verb</a> "<a href = vnd.unilang:видеть.html>ви́жу</a>" <a href = vnd.unilang:govern.html>governs</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> "<a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a>" transforms <a href = vnd.unilang:dog.html>dogs</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cat.html>cats</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a>.</i>)</li>

<dl><dd><ul><li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>Тут</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ки</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кот.html>кота́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>большие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́ги</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:большой.html>больших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стола́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Tut <b>dve</b> bolʹšije sobáki, <b>dva</b> bolʹšix kotá, <b>dve</b> bolʹšije knígi <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <b>dva</b> bolʹšix stolá.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:here.html>Here</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:big.html>big</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dog.html>dogs</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:big.html>big</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cat.html>cats</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:big.html>big</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>books</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:big.html>big</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:table.html>tables</a>.</span></dd></dl></div></li></ul></dd></dl>

<ul><li><ul><li><a href = vnd.unilang:another.html>Another</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:way.html>way</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>seeing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a>:</li></ul></li></ul>
<dl><dd><ul><li><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>Nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a> + <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a> + <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>Nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:masculine.html>masculine</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> + <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a> + <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a>.</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>Cases</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:other.html>other</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:than.html>than</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:accusative.html>accusative</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:dative.html>dative</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:instrumental.html>instrumental</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:prepositional.html>prepositional</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:use.html>use</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>forms</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:agree.html>agree</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:number.html>number</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a>.</li>

<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b> </b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:порядковый.html>поря́дковое</a> числительное — <a href = vnd.unilang:второй.html>второ́й</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собирательный.html>собира́тельные</a> числительные — <a href = vnd.unilang:двое.html>дво́е</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:оба.html>о́ба</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:целый.html>це́лое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:число.html>число</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:между.html>ме́жду</a> 1 (<a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>оди́н</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> 3 (<a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:эн.html>Эн</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:минус.html>ми́нус</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тний</a> (15383)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадца́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvadcátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-i-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лето.html>ле́то</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">léto</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ний</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тний</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcatilétnij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> twenty-year
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тнее</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:царствование.html>ца́рствование</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvadcatilétneje</b> cárstvovanije</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>twenty-year</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:reign.html>reign</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>twenty-year-old
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатилетний.html>двадцатиле́тняя</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:женщина.html>же́нщина</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvadcatilétnjaja</b> žénščina</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:woman.html>woman</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:twenty.html>twenty</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <b>twenty-year-old</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:woman.html>woman</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>ле́т</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ний</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 2*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффикс: <b>-дцат</b>; интерфикс: <b>-и-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-лет-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***двадцатка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a> (26196)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcátka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́ток</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:twenty.html>twenty</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:twenty.html>twenty</a> roubles, <a href = vnd.unilang:dollar.html>dollars</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>.</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:tram.html>tram</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:bus.html>bus</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:etc.html>etc</a>.) <a href = vnd.unilang:number.html>number</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:twenty.html>twenty</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>двад<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ца́т<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-дцат-к</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:сумма.html>су́мма</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:равный.html>ра́вная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцати́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:денежный.html>де́нежных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:единица.html>едини́ц</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:купюра.html>купю́ра</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:достоинство.html>досто́инством</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцати́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:денежный.html>де́нежных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:единица.html>едини́ц</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="публицистическое">публиц.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:совокупность.html>совоку́пность</a> кого-, чего-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количество.html>коли́честве</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>двадцати́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:лучший.html>лу́чших</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> каком-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:отношение.html>отноше́нии</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:среди.html>среди́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>себе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подобный.html>подо́бных</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***двадцатый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a> (4042)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvadcátyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:twentieth.html>twentieth</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатка.html>двадца́тка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvadcátka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">в-двадца́тых</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">v-dvadcátyx</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:порядковый.html>поря́дковое</a>, адъективное <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a> числительное — <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-дцат-∅</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="выступает в роли существительного">субстантивир.</span> 1920 (1820, 1720, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т.п) <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>год</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> XX <a href = vnd.unilang:век.html>век</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:вспомнить.html>Вспо́мни</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:товарищ.html>това́рищ</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́том</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***двадцать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a> (407)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-дцать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-dcatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> "twice <a href = vnd.unilang:ten.html>ten</a>". <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>This</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <small>[<a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>Term</a>?]</small> <a href = vnd.unilang:dual.html>dual</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a>.
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцать</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvádcatʹ</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дцать</b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:порядковый.html>поря́дковое</a> числительное — <a href = vnd.unilang:двадцатый.html>двадца́тый</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-а-</b>; суффикс: <b>-дцать</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***дважды.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a> (2591)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-жды</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ždy</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dváždy</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>twice, <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:occasion.html>occasions</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жи́зни</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dváždy</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> žízni</i> ― <span class="e-translation">twice <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:someone.html>someone</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:life.html>life</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>2x, twice <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:much.html>much</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дважды.html>два́жды</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пять</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>де́сять</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dváždy</b> pjatʹ — désjatʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:time.html>times</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:five.html>five</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ten.html>ten</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<li>20x, 20 <a href = vnd.unilang:time.html>times</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:much.html>much</a>: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двадцать.html>два́дцатью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvádcatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li>70x, 70 <a href = vnd.unilang:time.html>times</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:much.html>much</a>: <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:семьдесят.html>семью́десятью</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">semʹjúdesjatʹju</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

</div></div>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>два́ж<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ды</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-а-жды</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***двенадцатый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a> (6226)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvenádcatyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:twelfth.html>twelfth</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>дца<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:порядковый.html>Поря́дковое</a> числительное (<a href = vnd.unilang:счетный.html>счётное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>прилага́тельное</a>), <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
<a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a> числительное — <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-надцат-∅</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:номер.html>но́мер</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ряд.html>ряду</a> однородных <a href = vnd.unilang:объект.html>объе́ктов</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:одиннадцатый.html>оди́ннадцатого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:перед.html>пе́ред</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тринадцатый.html>трина́дцатым</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="выступает в роли существительного">субстантивир.</span> 2012 (1912, 1812, 1712, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т.п) <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>год</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатом</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>уже́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:командовать.html>кома́ндовал</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полок.html>полко́м</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***двенадцать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a> (1854)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p>Compounded <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> + <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> + <b>дцать</b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ten.html>ten</a></i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> used <a href = vnd.unilang:here.html>here</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:because.html>because</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:final.html>final</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:syllable.html>syllable</a> <b>дцать</b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>де́сять</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:substantive.html>substantive</a>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Numeral"><a href = vnd.unilang:numeral.html>Numeral</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцать.html>двена́дцать</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvenádcatʹ</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:над.html>на́д</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>цать</b>
</p><p>Числительное, <a href = vnd.unilang:количественный.html>коли́чественное</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:порядковый.html>поря́дковое</a> числительное — <a href = vnd.unilang:двенадцатый.html>двена́дцатый</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дв-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; суффикс: <b>-надцать</b>.
</p>

***дверной.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дверной.html>дверно́й</a> (6187)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dverʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-но́й</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверной.html>дверно́й</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvernój</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:door.html>door</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dverʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>двер<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ныть.html>но́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>Кра́ткая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остальной.html>остальны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>кра́тких</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднительный.html>затрудни́тельно</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-двер-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***дверца.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дверца.html>две́рца</a> (2264)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверца.html>две́рца</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvérca</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверца.html>две́рцы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверца.html>две́рцы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверца.html>две́рец</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dverʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:door.html>door</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>две́ри</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvéri</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверка.html>две́рка</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvérka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dverʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:преддверие.html>преддве́рие</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">preddvérije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверной.html>дверно́й</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvernój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">наддве́рный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">naddvérnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>две́р<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ца</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-двер-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:щупальце.html>-ц</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***дверь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a> (141)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dvьrь</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*dʰwer-</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:whence.html>whence</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href = vnd.unilang:door.html>door</a></i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dverʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>две́ри</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>две́ри</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>двере́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:door.html>door</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверя́х</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> <b>dverjáx</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:doorway.html>doorway</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:политика.html>поли́тика</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:открытый.html>откры́тых</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>двере́й</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">polítika otkrýtyx <b>dveréj</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:open-door.html>open-door</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:policy.html>policy</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:закрытый.html>закры́тых</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверя́х</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">pri zakrýtyx <b>dverjáx</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:behind.html>behind</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:close.html>closed</a> doors<i>; </i><a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:private.html>private</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 3-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 8e^  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дверь-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:возможность.html>возмо́жность</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:переход.html>перехо́да</a> (куда-либо; <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:иной.html>ино́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:состояние.html>состоя́ние</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:каждый.html>Ка́ждый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раз.html>раз</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:испытывать.html>испы́тываешь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:острый.html>о́строе</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувство.html>чу́вство</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:утрата.html>утра́ты</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>когда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:внезапно.html>внеза́пно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прерываться.html>прерыва́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>оди́н</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отрезок.html>отре́зок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жизнь.html>жи́зни</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:открываться.html>открыва́ется</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:дверь.html>дверь</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>друго́й</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BD_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Бережков, Валентин Михайлович"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"> — <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совсем.html>совсе́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:яма.html>я́ма</a>, — <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говорю́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a>. — <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> скорее <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***двести.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двести.html>две́сти</a> (1997)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>An</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dual.html>dual</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dual.html>dual</a> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">двѣстѣ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvěstě</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hundred.html>hundred</a> (200)</li></ol>

<p><b><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двести.html>две́сти</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvésti</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:govern.html>governs</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>noun</a>.
</p>

<li><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>они́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говори́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свои́х</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:двести.html>двухста́х</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:солдат.html>солда́тах</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Oní govoríli <a href = vnd.unilang:o.html>o</a> svoíx <b>dvuxstáx</b> soldátax.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:they.html>They</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>were</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:talk.html>talking</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:about.html>about</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:their.html>their</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hundred.html>hundred</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:soldier.html>soldiers</a>.</span></div></li></ul>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***двигавший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двигавший.html>дви́гавший</a> (5431)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигавший.html>дви́гавший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvígavšij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигать.html>дви́гать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvígatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двигавший.html>дви́гавший</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. </p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двигатель.html>дви́гатель</a> (2276)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигать.html>дви́гать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvígatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-тель</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-telʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>дви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:га.html>га</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-двиг-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-а-тель</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

Э. Циолковский</a>, «<a href="https://ru.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%97%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%91%D1%82_(%D0%A6%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9)" class="extiw" title="s:Звездолёт (Циолковский)"><a href = vnd.unilang:звездолет.html>Звездолёт</a></a>», <span class="example-date">1932</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:внутренний.html>вну́тренний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:механизм.html>механи́зм</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:движущий.html>дви́жущая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сила.html>си́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:явление.html>явле́ния</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:способствовать.html>спосо́бствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:развитие.html>разви́тию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:активность.html>акти́вности</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:пасть.html>Падёт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:грудь.html>грудь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:забота.html>забо́ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:камень.html>ка́мень</a>, // <a href = vnd.unilang:свобода.html>Свобо́ду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рука.html>ру́к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сковать.html>скуёт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нужда.html>нужда́</a>, // <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гаснуть.html>га́снет</a> вдохновенья <a href = vnd.unilang:пламень.html>пла́мень</a>, // <a href = vnd.unilang:могучий.html>Могу́чий</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигатель.html>дви́гатель</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:труд.html>труда́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%98%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD_%D0%A1%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Никитин, Иван Саввич"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:мотор.html>мото́р</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:движок.html>движо́к</a> (разг.)</li>

</body> 
***двигательный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:двигательный.html>дви́гательный</a> (12846)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигать.html>дви́гать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dvígatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-тельный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-telʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигательный.html>дви́гательный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dvígatelʹnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:impellent.html>impellent</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:motive.html>motive</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">causing <a href = vnd.unilang:motion.html>motion</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двигательный.html>дви́гательный</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:нерв.html>нерв</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvígatelʹnyj</b> nerv</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:motor.html>motor</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:nerve.html>nerve</a>)</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:двигательный.html>дви́гательная</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:активность.html>акти́вность</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dvígatelʹnaja</b> aktívnostʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:motion.html>motion</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>дви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:га.html>га</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-двиг-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-а-тельн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***двигать.html

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>дви́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:гать.html>гать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:двинуть.html>дви́нуть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-двиг-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

Ф. Писемский</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:масон.html>Масо́ны</a>», <span class="example-date">1880</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="книжное">книжн.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:побуждать.html>побужда́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:деятельность.html>де́ятельности</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чувство.html>чу́вствах</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трезвый.html>тре́звую</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:голова.html>голову</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:никогда.html>никогда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:понять.html>поня́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:двигать.html>дви́жет</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ком</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%94%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%91%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Дежнев, Николай Борисович">Н. Б. Дежнев</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>Год</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бродячий.html>бродя́чей</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ки</a>», <span class="example-date">2002</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
